name: UITextFieldDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods to manage the editing and validation of text in a text field object.

items.name: func textFieldShouldBeginEditing(UITextField) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to begin editing in the specified text field.

items.name: func textFieldDidBeginEditing(UITextField)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when editing begins in the specified text field.

items.name: func textFieldShouldEndEditing(UITextField) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to stop editing in the specified text field.

items.name: func textFieldDidEndEditing(UITextField, reason: UITextField.DidEndEditingReason)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when editing stops for the specified text field, and the reason it stopped.

items.name: func textFieldDidEndEditing(UITextField)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when editing stops for the specified text field.

items.name: enum UITextField.DidEndEditingReason
items.desc: Constants that indicate the reason for ending editing in a text field.

items.name: func textField(UITextField, shouldChangeCharactersIn: NSRange, replacementString: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to change the specified text.

items.name: func textFieldShouldClear(UITextField) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to remove the text fieldâ€™s current contents.

items.name: func textFieldShouldReturn(UITextField) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to process the pressing of the Return button for the text field.

items.name: func textFieldDidChangeSelection(UITextField)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the text selection changes in the specified text field.
